action.description: The committee on FIN recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 13 Ayes: Representative(s) Yamashita, Takenouchi, Grandinetti, Holt, Hussey, Kitagawa, Kusch, Lee, M., Morikawa, Templo; Ayes with reservations: Representative(s) Keohokapu-Lee Loy, Lamosao, Miyake; 2 Noes: Representative(s) Alcos, Reyes Oda; and 1 Excused: Representative(s) Ward.
